DOC.brief_summary: During IVF treatment women will be randomized into supplementation with a high or a low dose of Vitamin D Main outcome Laboratory pregnancy, live pregnancy at 12 weeks, Baby take home rate, OHSS Secondary outcome: 1. Pregnancy complications (pregnancy hypertension, SGA, Diabetes) 2.Thrombin generation
DOC.brief_title: Vitamin D During In Vitro Fertilisation (IVF) - A Prospective Randomized Trial
DOC.criteria: All women initiating IVF treatment Women that have entered the study before
DOC.keyword: Pregnancy rate (pos test, live fetus at 12 weeks, baby home)
